title: M-BTC
author: M-BTC
content: I'm auctioning one of the Kialara Signature Series – ‘Soul of Satoshi’ on Plebeian Market, a new P2P Lightning auction platform!The Kialara Signature Series is a collaboration between Kialara and several artists. This Bitcoin cold storage contains artwork from Maxfield Mellenbruch (Kialara himself) printed on museum quality archival card stock, polished stainless steel enclosure, tempered glass, one troy ounce of .999 fine silver, tamper-evident hologram. Kialara have produced some of the most desirable crypto physical collectables, with this piece being no exception. There is no bitcoin funding made to this piece.CLICK HERE TO GO TO THE AUCTION

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.created_time: July 06, 2022, 06:39:18 AMLast edit: July 06, 2022, 07:13:08 AM by M-BTC
comments.body: Bump! Current high bid is 800.001 sats (0.008 BTC).EDIT: To be clear, the winning bid can be settled on-chain as well.

comments.author: Tim101
comments.body: Is there anyway to upload a couple more pictures of this item?

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: Bump, less than a day left!Current high bid: 0.009 BTC

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on July 08, 2022, 09:10:59 AMhello  "shipping from Europe": EU or non-EU?is it also possible to place bids here or just on the auction side?Hey!It's shipping from Europe (the Netherlands). I'm trying out the Plebeian Market platform so bids can only be placed there. You can login using any Lightning wallet but your wallet doesn't need a balance (so just download any of the suggested wallets and scan the QR). Bids can be paid both on-chain and on Lightning.
